thread.title: Muhammad Ali honored in his Kentucky hometown
thread.title_full: Muhammad Ali honored in his Kentucky hometown - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Gary B. Graves, Ap Sports Writer
title: Muhammad Ali honored in his Kentucky hometown
text: Photo: Timothy D. Easley, AP Lonnie Ali, wife of former heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, tells a story of a young Ali to the audience at the Sports Illustrated Legacy Awards Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, in Louisville, Ky. Sports Illustrated announced that it will dedicate the franchise's Sportsman Legacy Award in the name of boxing legend Muhammad Ali. Lonnie Ali, wife of former heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad... LOUISVILLE, Ky. (AP) — Muhammad Ali won another round of love and appreciation for his achievements as a fighter in and out of the ring. He even got the hardware to prove it. Lonnie Ali, wife of former heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, tells a story of a young Ali to the audience at the Sports Illustrated Legacy Awards Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, in Louisville, Ky.
